title: Semester V & VI Examination Timetable Published
description: The detailed timetable for the upcoming B.A, B.Com, B.Sc Semester V & VI examinations has been published. Students are advised to check the 'Student Zone' page or the college notice board.

title: Annual Cultural Fest 'Yuvotsav 2025'
description: Get ready for 'Yuvotsav 2025', our annual cultural festival! Join us for three days of vibrant performances, competitions, and fun. Detailed schedule will be released soon.

title: Library Books Due Date Extension
description: The due date for all library books issued before October 15th, 2025, has been extended to November 30th, 2025, without any late fees.

title: Guest Lecture: AI & Future Technologies
description: A guest lecture by Dr. Anya Sharma, a leading AI researcher, on 'Artificial Intelligence and Future Technologies'. Open for all students and faculty. Pre-registration recommended.

title: Scholarship Application Deadline Approaching
description: The deadline for submitting applications for various government and institutional scholarships for the academic year 2025-26 is November 25th, 2025. Ensure all documents are submitted on time.

title: Annual Sports Meet
description: The much-awaited Annual Sports Meet is here! Participate in various track and field events, team sports, and showcase your athletic prowess. Registrations open from Dec 1st.
